[vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1483452541784{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”]Celebrate your fandom with this California Splashes enamel money clip. It features California Splashes graphics. This money clip is the perfect way to display your California Splashes pride.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width=”1/2″][stm_icon_list list_type=”font” title=”fa fa-check”]

  • Material: 100% Metal
  • Measures approximately 2.25“ x .5“
  • Made of metal
  • Comes with a gift box
  • Double grip backing

[/stm_icon_list][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″][stm_icon_list list_type=”font” title=”fa fa-check”]

  • Enameled logo
  • Officially licensed
  • Imported
  • Brand: Cufflinks

[/stm_icon_list][/vc_column][/vc_row]

excerpt.rendered: Celebrate your fandom with this California Splashes enamel money clip. It features California Splashes graphics. This money clip is the perfect way to display your California Splashes pride.
